description: The easiest way to write docs for your project.
sentence.brand: Build awesome documentation, Engrafia + NextJs allow you to write your documentation with MD or MDX files.
performant.sentence: NextJs is a powerful React framework, it's performant, and all this performance is up to you, just try it!
next.power.sentence: Egrafia is empowered by NextJs, so you can expect performance, and a rouge ecosystem to custom your documentation.
easy.to.use.sentence: Don't worry about stuff like, sidebar menu, top menu, table of content, layout, or other things, Engrafia provides everything for you, just relax and write your MD files.
